description:
South Africa's first black president and anti-apartheid icon Nelson Mandela has died at the age of 95.

Mr Mandela led South Africa's transition from white-minority rule in the 1990s, after 27 years in prison for his political activities.

He had been receiving intensive medical care at home for a lung infection after spending three months in hospital.

Announcing the news on South African national TV, President Jacob Zuma said Mr Mandela was at peace.

"Our nation has lost its greatest son," Mr Zuma said. "Although we knew that this day would come, nothing can diminish our sense of a profound and enduring loss."

A crowd has gathered outside the house where Mr Mandela died. Some are flying South African flags and wearing the shirts of the governing African National Congress, which Mr Mandela once led.

The Nobel Peace Prize laureate was one of the world's most revered statesmen after preaching reconciliation despite being imprisoned for 27 years.

He had rarely been seen in public since officially retiring in 2004. He made his last public appearance in 2010, at the football World Cup in South Africa.

His fellow campaigner against apartheid, Archbishop Desmond Tutu, said he was "not only an amazing gift to humankind, he made South Africans and Africans feel good about being who we are. He made us walk tall. God be praised."

BBC correspondents say Mr Mandela's body will be moved to a mortuary in the capital, Pretoria, and the funeral is likely to take place next Saturday.

【新闻快讯】据外电报道，南非总统祖玛宣布，南非首位黑人总统、反种族隔离斗士、前总统曼德拉去世，享年95岁。祖玛在国家电视台讲话中表示，曼德拉在平静中离开，“我们的国家失去了她最伟大的儿子”。

祖马同时宣布，南非将为曼德拉举行国葬。全国将从12月6日起降半旗致哀，直至国葬结束。

联合国秘书长潘基文5日发表声明，对于曼德拉的逝世表示哀悼。潘基文在声明当中高度评价了曼德拉的一生，把他称作是世界舞台上一位非凡的人物，是一位“正 义的巨人”。美国总统奥巴马5日也在白宫发表电视讲话悼念曼德拉，称“我们失去了地球上最有影响力、最勇敢、最好的一个人”

description:
《东区女巫》（Witches Of East End）是由美国有线电视台Lifetime播出的一部魔幻剧，本剧根据Melissa de la Cruz撰写的同名小说改编，原著曾登上过《纽约时报》畅销书排行榜。该剧描述了主人公Joanna，一名长生不老的女巫。她在每个轮回中都会生下两个女儿。这两个女儿和正常的人类一样，会长大并死去，然后Joanna就会再次怀孕。Joanna并不希望她的女儿们接触到任何有关女巫的内容，然而她的妹妹，Wendy却不这么想。当Joanna在这个轮回中的两个女儿得知她们的家庭真相之后，她们的生活也发生了翻天覆地的变化。

充满诗情画意的小镇生活被彻底打破，一个古老的敌人再次找上门来，意图彻底终结Beauchamp家的血脉。在这关键时刻，Freya和Ingrid会接受自己的命运吗？她们体内蕴藏的力量能够帮助她们生存下去吗？

Lifetime为本剧总结出八个剧情关键词：命运、复仇、姐妹、罪孽、诅咒、权力、激情和欲望。一起来看看这部剧的基本信息和演员阵容吧！

【剧集基本信息】
导演: Mark Waters
编剧: Maggie Friedman / Melissa de la Cruz
主演: Julia Ormond / Jenna Dewan-Tatum / Rachel Boston / Mädchen Amick / Daniel DiTomasso
类型: 剧情
制片国家/地区: 美国
语言: 英语
首播: 2013-10-06(美国)
单集片长: 40分钟

【演员阵容】

Julia Ormond朱莉娅·奥蒙德

Among her film work, Julia Ormond starred in the epic "Legends of the Fall" alongside actors Brad Pitt, Anthony Hopkins and Aidan Quinn and played the lead role opposite Harrison Ford in the film "Sabrina," directed by Sydney Pollack.在朱莉娅奥蒙德的电影作品中，有和布拉德·皮特、安东尼·霍普金斯和艾丹·奎恩一起出演的史诗《燃情岁月》；她还在导演西德尼·波拉克的电影《萨布丽娜》中，与哈里森·福特上演主要的对手戏。

Jenna Dewan Tatum珍娜·迪万-塔图姆

Jenna Dewan Tatum first captured audience’s attention when she appeared on-screen in the lead role in the hit film "Step Up."珍娜·迪万-塔图姆最先吸引人们关注的作品，是其作为主角出演的热门电影《舞出真我》。
Rachel Boston瑞秋·波士顿
Rachel Boston fell in love with theater at the age of seven when she was cast in a church production. At 17, she moved to New York City to pursue an acting career. 瑞秋·波士顿七岁时在一次教堂作品的拍摄中爱上了戏剧。在她17岁时，瑞秋·波士顿搬到了纽约，以追求演艺事业。

Mädchen Amick梅晨·阿米克

Amick's acting career began with roles on "Star Trek: The Next Generation" and "Baywatch." Her feature credits include Stephen King’s "Sleepwalkers," "Trapped in Paradise" opposite Nicolas Cage, "Scenes of the Crime" with Jeff Bridges.梅晨·阿米克的演艺生涯开始于《星际迷航：下一代》和《海岸救生队》。她的电影作品包括斯蒂芬·金的《梦游》，与尼古拉斯·凯奇搭戏的《困在天堂》及与杰夫·布里吉斯一同出演的《犯罪场景》。
Daniel DiTomasso丹尼尔·迪托马索
Before transitioning into acting, DiTomasso had a successful career as a model, shooting campaigns for a wide range of clients including Giorgio Armani and L’Oréal. His recent guest-starring roles include appearances on The CW’s "Beauty and the Beast" and CBS’s "CSI."迪托马索在转型为演员之前是一名成功的模特，拍摄客户广泛，包括乔治·阿玛尼与欧莱雅。最近他客串出演的剧有CW的《美女与野兽》和CBS的《犯罪现场调查》。
